attributes.action: maintain the complete freedom of the judiciary to investigate and arrest those suspected of war crimes, human rights violations, genocide, and crimes against humanity.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Whether these individuals be members of British or foriegn govenments.  The judiciary should not be hindered by the British government in holding people to account for international crimes.  Regardless of strategic partnerships the government should help ensure international law is maintained, not abondoned.
